original_text:
And he will spread out his hands in the midst of it
    as a swimmer spreads his hands out to swim,
    but the Lord will lay low his pompous pride together with the skill of his hands.
korean_text: 그가 헤엄치는 자가 헤엄치려고 손을 폄 같이 그 속에서 그의 손을 펼 것이나 여호와께서 그의 교만으로 인하여 그 손이 능숙함에도 불구하고 그를 누르실 것이라

sentences.original_text: And he will spread out his hands in the midst of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 가운데서 그의 손을 펼 것이요

sentences.original_text: as a swimmer spreads his hands out to swim
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 수영하는 자가 수영하려고 손을 펼치는 것 같으니

sentences.original_text: but the Lord will lay low his pompous pride
together with the skill of his hands.
